text: The New Teacher () is a 1939 Soviet comedy drama movie directed by Sergei Gerasimov.Биография Сергея ГерасимоваУчитель It stars Boris Chirkov, Tamara Makarova, and Lyudmila Shabalina. == Actors == * Boris Chirkov as Stepan Ivanovich Lautin * Tamara Makarova as Agrafena Grunya Shumilina * Lyudmila Shabalina as Mariya Ivanovna Lautina * Pavel Volkov as Ivan Fedorovich Lautin * Valentina Telegina as Stepanida Ivanovna Lautina == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:1939 comedy movies Category:1939 drama movies Category:1930s comedy- drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Gerasimov Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: The New Teacher
